/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.title: immich-microservices helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.name: immich-microservices
/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.doc:
Immich is a self-hosted photo and video backup solution.

For immich, there are multiple helm deployments:

  • immich-web
  • immich-server
  • immich-typesense
  • immich-machine-learning
  • immich-microservices (this one)

For redis and postgres, there are multiple helm charts:

  • Redis: app-template/redis, bitnami/redis
  • PostgreSQL: operator cloudnative-pg/cloudnative-pg, bitnami bitnami/postgresql

0:
server:
  enable:
    debug:
      server: true
  listen:
    address: 'http://0.0.0.0:8000'
service:
  alertmanager:
    address: http://alertmanager.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:9093
  kubernetes:
    address: ''
    inCluster: true
    tls:
      caFile: ''
      crtFile: ''
      keyFile: ''
